title: Brightening Facial
shortDescription: Great solution if you are developing dark patches or spots in your skin. This is known as hyperpigmentation.
benefits: Gets right at the source. of unwanted discoloration.
Dissolving Rogue pigment cells on the spot.
Best if done in 4 concecutive results.

title: Smoothing Facial
shortDescription: Great if you have sensitive skin, redness on face. Using a restorative moisture mask you will leave feeling comfortable rather than irritated.
benefits: Instantly subdues inflammation, visible redness and any reactions.
Removes dry, flaming skin, and surface irritants.

title: Nourishing Facial
shortDescription: Gets rid of flaking dead skin. Leave looking fresh, dewy, and more radiant.
benefits: Gentle deep cleansing lifts away dry and flaking dead skin.
Helps skin soak up rejuvinating hydration.
Leave looking fresh and feeling radiant.

title: Cooling Globes
shortDescription: Tightens and plumps your skin. Great for closing pores, reducing previous scarring and provides natural headache and sinus relief.
